example_sentence_italian: Il colore della facciata è nuovo.
example_sentence_english: The color of the facade is new.
The plaster falls from the facade.
There is a crack in the facade.
They project lights onto the facade.

example_sentence_italian: Le decorazioni delle facciate sono originali.
example_sentence_english: The decorations of the facades are original.
They opened windows in the facades.
They project images onto the facades.
